thread.title: very convenient location, comfortable bed and very large bathroom. The men in the reception are very nice!!!
thread.title_full: very convenient location, comfortable bed and very large bathroom. The men in the reception are very nice!!! - Review of L'Ouest Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 61yux
title: very convenient location, comfortable bed and very large bathroom. The men in the reception are very nice!!!
text: very convenient location, comfortable bed and very large bathroom. The men in the reception are very nice!!! It's safe that we give our keys to the reception when we go out, in this way they can better control people enter the hotel. Very sensible management!
